resources.string: Hello World! My name is Josue Vicente and this is me in Antigua, Guatemala a few years back. It\'s a beautiful city! I have some experience with the deployment of Android apps but I am excited to learn more about how to build them in a more structured way.
Show Previous Work Pic and Info
A calendar page done in Compose to help gather events for the SHPE UF organization. I worked on repositories, room databases, shared preferences, notifications and more!
